title: Ohio Police Post Graphic Photograph of Adults Passed Out from Heroin with Child in Car
subtitle: East Liverpool, Ohio, police posted a photograph of two adults who were  passed out in their car, reportedly from overdosing on heroin, with a child in the back seat.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A photograph taken by a responding police officer shows a couple passed out in their vehicle from a suspected heroin overdose, with their child in the back seat.
